description:
Learning to sell on Amazon can be fun and easy with the right knowledge. It can also be a great tool for adding additional income to your monthly budget without taking a lot of your time. This course aims to provide the tools and resources you need to start selling on Amazon fast.

This course contains 10 lectures that are designed to provide the necessary information needed to begin selling on Amazon in a minimal amount of time. It's designed for anyone who wants to begin or is thinking about beginning to sell on Amazon.

By the end of this course, you'll have the basics background knowledge you need to set up your Amazon seller account, use product Sales ranking to source valuable inventory and list and fulfill your Amazon orders.
title: A Quick Start Guide to Selling on Amazon
